      • passesValidation

        protected boolean passesValidation(HttpServletRequest req,
                       ConfigFileForm cff,
                       ActionMapping mapping,
                       ConfigChannel channel,
                       java.util.Map params)
        Check for new-file-creation validity. The order of importance is:
        1. IF upload - a file-to-be uploaded was provided
        2. Filename and path are valid
        3. Filename is unique in this channel
        4. Everything Else
        Parameters:
        req - incoming request
        cff - associated ConfigFileForm
        mapping - incoming action-mapping
        channel - channel we're creating a file into
        params - associated parameters
        Returns:
        true if everything's valid, false (and messages have been stored) else

                     DynaActionForm form,

                     ConfigChannel channel,
                     java.util.Map params)
